home_hero_title: The platform for the digital precence of your city or destination!
home_hero_subtitle: Create, configure and engage your visitors to your heart's content!
app_features_title: An app for the complete guest experience!
app_features_individual_exploration_text: Personalized suggestions based on selected preferences and other data points such as weather and time
app_features_thematic_tours_text: A personal guide for each of your visitors, leading and telling interesting stories along the way.
app_features_events_and_offers_text: Provides information about upcoming events and advertises current special offers. Anyone bitten? The app takes you straight to the destination!
sum_features_for_cities_text: Citybot offers a cloud admin tool to manage individual attractions, tours, events and other special offers under one roof.
sum_features_full_control_text: You retain full control and overview of your content. Only you decide what content you want to present and how.
sum_features_analytics_text: Learn from your visitor data and improve your offerings accordingly.
sum_features_cost_title: Cost-efficient and flexible. Cost advantage guaranteed!
sum_features_cost_text: Why develop your own solution when it can be licensed flexibly at a fraction of the development and maintenance costs? We provide the technology, you provide the best possible content! Efficient division of labor at its finest!
sum_features_for_visitors_text: CityBot offers a mobile app to discover your city/destination in different ways.
sum_features_wholistic_experience_text: One app for the entire journey. From planning, choosing, navigating to detailed on-site information, no more jumping between various websites, Google Maps, and other platforms.
sum_features_personalized_text: Personalized suggestions based on user preferences and a range of different options—naturally supported by AI!
sum_features_multi_destination_text: Spare your visitors from installing yet another app. Join a network of cities/destinations and get discovered by other users.
cmt_features_subtitle: Create and manage individual attractions, tours, events, and special offers using the Content Management System (CMS).
cmt_features_multimedia_text: Presentation through text, video, and audio. More coming soon (augmented reality (AR))!
cmt_features_pois_text: It’s the small secrets that make a visit unforgettable. Create individual attractions that are worth visiting on their own. Place the small or big insider tips that no one else knows about.
cmt_features_tours_text: Combine individual attractions into thematic tours.
cmt_features_events_text: Link upcoming events and other special offers from third-party providers.
cmt_features_digital_branding_text: Configure colors and graphics to decorate the mobile app interface with your brand. It’s like having your own app—but without the hassle of programming!
